Html: Several high impacting community members have been honored by Blizzard in the Icecrown release by having Items named after them. Our own Astrylian has a Leather Belt named after him. Landsoul gets a Greathelm and Toskk has some Bracers. Anyone found any others?
I saw Landsoul's helm, but missed Astry's shoutout.  Congratulations, it's well-deserved!
Indalamar got a sword to add to his collection, although that's not really in the same vein as these three.
I'm going to petition Bllizzard for Levva's Head Cracker Opener.
IMO, a non-combat bear pet called Jothay's RAWR of Posting Guidelines
